name: Grand River Hospital to Waterloo Regional Health Network (WHRN) - WRHN at Midtown
comment:
Campus services include acute care, pediatrics, maternal care, mental health and addiction services, emergency department and outpatient programs * regional cancer centre

Emergency Department Wait Times: www.grhosp.on.ca/care/services-departments/emergency/current-emergency-wait

Services and Programs:
  • Adult Diabetes Education Centre
  • Clinical Nutrition - Nutrition Counselling
  • Emergency Department
  • Laboratory
  • Medical Imaging
  • Occupational Therapy
  • Renal Clinic
  • Secondary Stroke Prevention Clinic
  • Spiritual Care
